item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me # Hi, my name is Derek Farr. Thanks for visiting my website.

item.title: About This Site
item.description: About This Site # This site is a basic exemplar of the Jamstack. It uses: Hugo as a static site generator Hugo Book as a theme for Hugo GitHub to host the source code repository Netlify CMS as a “headless” CMS Netlify for hosting and CI/CD More information For a helpful guide to building sites like this—with Jamstack architecture and headless CMS—see this article on stackbit.com.
